name: repository_stars
description: Metrics related to the stargazers of a repository, including the count of stars and details about the first and last stars given.

dimensions.name: starred_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the star was given.

dimensions.name: user_login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who starred the repository.

measures.name: total_stars
measures.description: The total number of stars the repository has received.

measures.name: first_star_time
measures.description: The timestamp when the first star was given to the repository.

measures.name: last_star_time
measures.description: The timestamp when the last star was given to the repository.

sample_questions: How many stars does the repo have?
When was the first star given?
When was the last star given?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT starred_at, user__login AS user_login FROM assistant_ui_stargazers_20241108111329.stargazers
